mapper.select: SELECT transaction.order_id, transaction.customer_id, transaction.order_price, transaction.order_create_time, transaction.order_end_time, transaction.order_edit_time, transaction.order_status, transaction.business_id, review.review_context, review.review_star, business.business_username, -- 新添加的字段，表示从business表中获取的商家用户名 customer.customer_username -- 新添加的字段，表示从customer表中获取的客户用户名 FROM transaction LEFT JOIN review ON transaction.order_id = review.order_id LEFT JOIN business -- 左连接business表 ON transaction.business_id = business.business_id LEFT JOIN customer -- 左连接customer表 ON transaction.customer_id = customer.customer_id;
